about_the_game:
CosmicBreak Universal is now offering a delightful item pack especially for Abyss Jikun's fans!

A must-have for all Abyss Jikun Hu's enthusiasts, this DLC included limited characters like Jukin-chan and Abyss Jikun Hu Bike, parts, titles, and other exclusive items! Don't pass this chance up!

Pack Contents (Robots)
  • Abyssal Phantom
  • Jikun Hu-kun

Pack Contents (Parts)
  • Conversion Parts [Chloe Souvenir]（x1）
  • Title [Phantom Blaze]（x1）
  • Title [Tiger Claws]（x1）
  • Title [Messenger from Hell]（x1）
  • Title [Bike Fan♪]（x1）

Pack Conents (Other)
  • Cosmo Harmonics 20%（x30）
  • Tune-Up Set 10（x5）
  • ALL×3 Ticket 1h（x3）

※Purchase of this Pack is limited to one per account.
※The Zero Saber visible in the screenshot is not included in this Pack.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10 (64bitOS)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 1.6GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce4 / ATI RADEON 8500
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1.9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (64bitOS)
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Core2 Duo E6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9600 / ATI Radeon HD 2900
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1.9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card (DirectX 9.0c and above)
